name: WitchTowerDefense
description:
A cute tower defense game made in Unity for PB & Game Jam 3. Your win objective is to destroy the enemy castle, but don't let them destroy yours. 

Things we want to add in the future:

  1. More levels, and fight more different enemies
  2. Level up system, learn/unlock new skills
  3. Shop where you can buy troop of type and upgrades
  4. Redo all the art
  5. Mobile support

Assets used:

  1. Main menu drawn by Pixitales
  2. Character sprites by pipoya and Tiles & towers by Inscope
  3. Music from Opengameart.org

Thanks for playing, be sure to check out my other games.
